buildCommand: pnpm --filter switch-shared run build:prod && pnpm --filter switch-client run build:prod && cp -r ./dist ../dist
ignoreCommand: bash -c 'COMMIT_MSG="$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_MESSAGE"; CHANGED_FILES=$(git diff HEAD^ HEAD --name-only 2>/dev/null || echo ""); echo "Commit: $COMMIT_MSG"; echo "Files: $CHANGED_FILES"; if [[ "$COMMIT_MSG" == *"server:"* ]] || [[ "$COMMIT_MSG" == *"Railway"* ]] || [[ "$COMMIT_MSG" == *"CI/CD"* ]] || [[ "$COMMIT_MSG" == *"GitHub Actions"* ]] || echo "$CHANGED_FILES" | grep -E "^(server/|railway\.toml|\.github/|docs/)" >/dev/null && ! echo "$CHANGED_FILES" | grep -E "^(client/|shared/|vercel\.json)" >/dev/null; then echo "ðŸš« Skipping Vercel build - server/infra only changes"; exit 1; else echo "âœ… Client changes detected - proceeding with Vercel build"; exit 0; fi'
